summary: There is no credible evidence of illegal voting.

statements.quote: Well now if you take a look at the votes, when I say that, I mean mostly they register wrong, in other words, for the votes, they register incorrectly, and/or illegally. And they then vote. You have tremendous numbers of people.
Of course there is large scale voter fraud happening on and before election day. Why do Republican leaders deny what is going on? So naive!

name: voter fraud in 2016 election
